ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Oh my, Provocation....
ygData.msgSnippet: rofl! I think what she meant was that you don t need an instrument to get the song s max Haste ;o)~ *takes Rokken s medication away* -=B=- ... From: Reeves,
ygData.messageBody:
rofl!
I think what she meant was that you don't need an instrument to get the
song's max Haste ;o)~
*takes Rokken's medication away*

-=B=-
----- Original Message -----
From: "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, November 20, 2000 1:24 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Oh my, Provocation....


> Ester just posted this about the New and Improved Jonthan's Provocation:
>
> Here is the official answer
> Thanks for the info. Ive changed the song to singing skill. As far as
> reaching max cap on the haste portion of the song, when I originally
changed
> the song I changed its haste formula so that a bard would hit max haste
> without an instrunment.
>
>
> This is from Tolan, the person who is doing spells for Velious. Any other
> questions will be forwarded to him. I just post
>
>
>
> -------------------------------------------------
>
> Did I read this right? Max haste with just this song?
>
> /faint
>
>
> Rokenn
